hero.title: Professional experts guiding your business through growth and unique challenges.
hero.description: We provide comprehensive business solutions tailored to your company's needs with personalized attention and proven expertise in consulting, development, and strategic planning.

about.title: About Us
about.p-1: Orlean Group is a leading business solutions provider with over a decade of experience in delivering exceptional results. Our team of expert consultants combines deep industry knowledge with innovative strategies to help businesses thrive in today's competitive landscape.
about.p-2: We specialize in comprehensive business consulting, IT solutions, and strategic planning, offering tailored services that address your unique challenges. Our commitment to excellence and client success drives everything we do, ensuring sustainable growth and measurable results for your business.

services.title: Comprehensive IT & Digital Business Solutions
services.description: We offer a wide range of services to help you grow your business. From IT consulting to digital transformation, we have you covered.

faqs.title: This is the start of something new, let's make it happen
faqs.description: We offer a wide range of services to help you grow your business. From IT consulting to digital transformation, we have you covered.

faqs.title: What services does Orlean Group provide ?
faqs.content: Orlean Group offers software development, IT consulting, UI/UX design, digital marketing, automation solutions, and outsourcing services for businesses of all sizes. We also provide turnkey products and tailored enterprise systems.

faqs.title: Who can benefit from working with Orlean Group ?
faqs.content: We work with startups looking to build MVPs, growing businesses needing digital transformation, and enterprises seeking scalable systems. Our flexible approach adapts to various industries including retail, healthcare, education, logistics, and finance.

faqs.title: How does Orlean ensure quality and security ?
faqs.content: We follow industry best practices including agile methodologies, CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, and regular code audits. Security is prioritized through encrypted communications, strict access controls, and GDPR-compliant data handling.

faqs.title: Can Orlean handle full-cycle project development ?
faqs.content: Our team can manage the full product lifecycle: discovery, UI/UX design, development, testing, launch, and post-launch support. We also help with scaling infrastructure, monitoring, and long-term maintenance.

faqs.title: How can I get started or request a quote ?
faqs.content: You can contact us through our website's contact form, email us at hello@orlean.uz, or schedule a discovery call with one of our consultants. We'll listen to your needs and provide a tailored proposal within 24–48 hours.

faqs.title: How can I get started or request a quote ?
faqs.content: You can contact us through our website's contact form, email us at hello@orlean.uz, or schedule a discovery call with one of our consultants. We'll listen to your needs and provide a tailored proposal within 24–48 hours.

content.text: We are more than just a technology company; we are a dynamic ecosystem where innovation, expertise, and digital transformation converge to drive business success.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and handle your personal information when you use our website and services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience on our site.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.subtitle: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.subtitle: We use the information we collect to:

items.notices: Send you technical notices and support messages
items.communication: Communicate with you about products, services, and events

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

items.object: Object to processing of your data

meta.title: Terms of Service
meta.description: Terms of Service for Orlean Group

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

license.title: 2. Use License
license.content: Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials (information or software) on our website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.
license.subtitle: This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

items.commercial: Use the materials for any commercial purpose
items.reverse: Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on the website
items.copyright: Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials

account.title: 3. User Account
account.content: If you create an account on the website, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and you are fully responsible for all activities that occur under the account.

items.security: Maintain the security of your account and password
items.accuracy: Provide accurate and complete information when creating your account
items.notify: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

disclaimer.title: 4. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The materials on our website are provided on an 'as is' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim and negate all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property.

limitations.title: 5. Limitations
limitations.content: In no event shall we or our suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on our website.

revisions.title: 6. Revisions and Errata
revisions.content: The materials appearing on our website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. We do not warrant that any of the materials on our website are accurate, complete, or current.

links.title: 7. Links
links.content: We have not reviewed all of the sites linked to our website and are not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by us of the site.

modifications.title: 8. Modifications
modifications.content: We may revise these terms of service for our website at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.

law.title: 9. Governing Law
law.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location.

not-found.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

cookie-consent.title: Cookie Preferences
cookie-consent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Essential for the website to function properly. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites for marketing purposes.
